description: Updates the view content of the given view identifier in the specified Amazon Connect instance. It performs content validation if Status is set to SAVED and performs full content validation if Status is PUBLISHED. Note that the $SAVED alias' content will always be updated, but the $LATEST alias' content will only be updated if Status is PUBLISHED.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instanceId in the ARN of the instance.

parameters.name: ViewId
parameters.description: The identifier of the view. Both ViewArn and ViewId can be used.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Indicates the view status as either SAVED or PUBLISHED. The PUBLISHED status will initiate validation on the content.

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: View content containing all content necessary to render a view except for runtime input data and the runtime input schema, which is auto-generated by this operation. The total uncompressed content has a maximum file size of 400kB. Template (string) --- The view template representing the structure of the view. Actions (list) --- A list of possible actions from the view. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Template
nested_params.description: The view template representing the structure of the view.

nested_params.name: Actions
nested_params.description: A list of possible actions from the view.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the view.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates the view status as either SAVED or PUBLISHED. The PUBLISHED status will initiate validation on the content.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of the view - CUSTOMER_MANAGED.

nested_items.name: InputSchema
nested_items.description: The data schema matching data that the view template must be provided to render.

nested_items.name: Template
nested_items.description: The view template representing the structure of the view.

nested_items.name: Actions
nested_items.description: A list of possible actions from the view.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the view was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: Latest timestamp of the UpdateViewContent or CreateViewVersion operations.

nested_items.name: ViewContentSha256
nested_items.description: Indicates the checksum value of the latest published view content.
